channel.title: Networks on Phil in the Blank
channel.description: Recent content in Networks on Phil in the Blank

item.title: Exploring Mental Health Networks
item.description:
This is a brief project where I look at mental health symptom networks in a large sample of youth from the ABCD Study for the course Principles of Complex Systems. I was largely inspired by the work being done by Denny Borsboom and company using network analysis to study mental health. There is still a lot of work to do, but the report for the class can be found here.

Check out this awesome paper for more on applying complex systems thinking to psychopathology!

item.title: Data Science I Final Project: TV Tropes
item.description: This is a project I worked on with another graduate student in Data Science I. We open-sourced the code here: TV Tropes Data Science I Project. The project involved web scraping a large chunk of webpages from TV Tropes, network analysis, and data science!
